abstract: Things are starting to look up on Madison Avenue, or so it seems, as more advertising takes on the type of upbeat tone that had been noticeably missing during this recession.
snippet: Things are starting to look up on Madison Avenue, or so it seems, as more advertising takes on the type of upbeat tone that had been noticeably missing during this recession.
lead_paragraph: THINGS are starting to look up on Madison Avenue, or so it seems, as more advertising takes on the type of upbeat tone that had been noticeably missing during this recession.

headline.main: AT&T Image Campaign Accentuates the Positive, Not Products
headline.print_headline: AT&T Image Campaign Accentuates the Positive, Not Products
